title: Supervisors Election – Treasury League
body:
### Summary
Idle Governance is entering the team formation phase of the Treasury League.

This poll aims to elect the Supervisors that will approve/refuse rewards proposed by the PM and provide feedback to League’s activities.

[This post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431) collects the applications that were submitted in the period 23th April - 30th April.
### Details
Supervisor candidates:
- @ETM612 - [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431/4)
- @Idle Labs - [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431/7)
- @RTP2016 - [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431/8)
- @George -  [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431/9)
 
The Treasury League will select the top 3 candidates.

Each address can only vote for one choice and it is not possible to split the voting power (this is how the current Snapshot polls work). Note that you can change your vote at any moment, therefore if the name you chose is already in the top positions, you can switch the selection and pick another preferred profile.

### Other References:
- [A Step Towards Idle Leagues – Dev & Treasury](https://gov.idle.finance/t/a-step-towards-idle-leagues-dev-treasury/419)
- [About Idle Leagues](https://idlefinance.medium.com/about-idle-leagues-73fa538f18e5)

### Vote Options
A candidate is successfully elected if reached at least 10’000 IDLE votes. Please note that it's possible to change the votes at any moment till the voting window is closed.

Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
- Elect Idle Labs
- Elect ETM612
- Elect RTP2016
- Elect George
- None of the above
author: 0x30723bb508E84706297EeF689C20096907023897
